mapper.sql: PID, RULE_NO, GROUP_ID, ARTIFACT_ID, RULE_VERSION, STATUS, DRL, DESCRIPTION, NOTE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME

mapper.insert: insert into RULE_INFO (PID, RULE_NO, GROUP_ID, ARTIFACT_ID, RULE_VERSION, STATUS, DESCRIPTION, NOTE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DRL) values (#{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ruleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{artifactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{drl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update RULE_INFO
RULE_NO = #{ruleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARTIFACT_ID = #{artifactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RULE_VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DRL = #{drl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where PID = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update RULE_INFO set RULE_NO = #{ruleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARTIFACT_ID = #{artifactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RULE_VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DRL = #{drl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where PID = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from RULE_INFO where GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ARTIFACT_ID = #{artifactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RULE_VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select DISTINCT GROUP_ID, ARTIFACT_ID, RULE_VERSION, STATUS from RULE_INFO
AND `GROUP_ID` like concat(concat('%',#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND `ARTIFACT_ID` like concat(concat('%',#{artifactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
select DRL from RULE_INFO where GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ARTIFACT_ID = #{artifactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STATUS = 1

select DISTINCT RULE_VERSION from RULE_INFO where GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ARTIFACT_ID = #{artifactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CREATE_TIME IN (select max(CREATE_TIME) from RULE_INFO where GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ARTIFACT_ID = #{artifactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select count(PID) from RULE_INFO where GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ARTIFACT_ID = #{artifactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(DISTINCT RULE_NO) from RULE_INFO
AND `GROUP_ID` like concat(concat('%',#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND `ARTIFACT_ID` like concat(concat('%',#{artifactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')

select DISTINCT RULE_NO, GROUP_ID, ARTIFACT_ID, RULE_VERSION, STATUS, NOTE from (select RULE_NO, GROUP_ID, ARTIFACT_ID, RULE_VERSION, STATUS, NOTE from RULE_INFO
AND `GROUP_ID` like concat(concat('%',#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND `ARTIFACT_ID` like concat(concat('%',#{artifactId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
order by CREATE_TIME desc limit #{startIndex, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize, jdbcType=INTEGER}) temp_table
mapper.update: update RULE_INFO set STATUS = 0 where RULE_NO = #{ruleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
